```
function updateSidebarActive(title) {
    document.querySelectorAll('.sidebar-nav .nav-link').forEach(link =&gt; {
        link.classList.remove('active');
        if (link.getAttribute('data-article') === title) {
            link.classList.add('active');
            
            // å±•å¼€çˆ¶çº§
            const subgroup = link.closest('.nav-subgroup-items');
            const group = link.closest('.nav-group-items');
            
            if (subgroup) {
                subgroup.classList.add('expanded');
                const subgroupTitle = subgroup.previousElementSibling;
                if (subgroupTitle) subgroupTitle.classList.add('expanded');
            }
            
            if (group) {
                group.classList.add('expanded');
                const groupTitle = group.previousElementSibling;
                if (groupTitle) groupTitle.classList.add('expanded');
            }
            }
        });
    }

// ===== æ˜¾ç¤ºé¦–é¡µ =====
function showHome() {
    homeContent.style.display = 'block';
    articleContent.style.display = 'none';
    searchResults.style.display = 'none';
    currentArticle = null;
    
    document.querySelectorAll('.sidebar-nav .nav-link').forEach(l =&gt; l.classList.remove('active'));
}

// ===== å±•å¼€å¯¼èˆªï¿½?=====
function expandGroup(group) {
    const groupTitle = document.querySelector(&#96;.nav-group-title[data-group="${group}"]&#96;);
    const groupItems = document.querySelector(&#96;.nav-group-items[data-group="${group}"]&#96;);
    
    if (groupTitle &amp;&amp; groupItems) {
        groupTitle.classList.add('expanded');
        groupItems.classList.add('expanded');
        
        // æ»šåŠ¨åˆ°å¯¹åº”ä½ï¿½?
        groupTitle.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' });
    }
}
```

```
function expandGroup(group) {
    const groupTitle = document.querySelector(&#96;.nav-group-title[data-group="${group}"]&#96;);
    const groupItems = document.querySelector(&#96;.nav-group-items[data-group="${group}"]&#96;);
    
    if (groupTitle &amp;&amp; groupItems) {
        groupTitle.classList.add('expanded');
        groupItems.classList.add('expanded');
        
        // æ»šåŠ¨åˆ°å¯¹åº”ä½ï¿½?
        groupTitle.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' });
    }
}
```

// ===== å›½å®¶è¯¦æƒ…æ ‡ç­¾é¡µ =====
function generateCountryTabs(country) {
    let html = '';
    const airportCount = (country.airports?.international?.length || 0) + (country.airports?.domestic?.length || 0);
    const portCount = (country.ports?.international?.length || 0) + (country.ports?.domestic?.length || 0);
    const airlineCount = country.airlines?.length || 0;
    const shippingCount = country.shippingLines?.length || 0;
    const provinceCount = country.provinces?.length || 0;
    const customsCount = country.customsPolicies?.length || 0;
    
    html += '<div class="country-tabs-horizontal">';
    if (airportCount > 0) html += '<button class="country-tab active" onclick="switchCountryTab(event,''airports'')">æœºåœº <span class="tab-count">' + airportCount + '</span></button>';
    if (portCount > 0) html += '<button class="country-tab" onclick="switchCountryTab(event,''ports'')">æ¸¯å£ <span class="tab-count">' + portCount + '</span></button>';
    if (airlineCount > 0) html += '<button class="country-tab" onclick="switchCountryTab(event,''airlines'')">èˆªå¸ <span class="tab-count">' + airlineCount + '</span></button>';
    if (shippingCount > 0) html += '<button class="country-tab" onclick="switchCountryTab(event,''shipping'')">èˆ¹å¸ <span class="tab-count">' + shippingCount + '</span></button>';
    if (provinceCount > 0) html += '<button class="country-tab" onclick="switchCountryTab(event,''provinces'')">çœä»½åŸå¸‚ <span class="tab-count">' + provinceCount + '</span></button>';
    if (customsCount > 0) html += '<button class="country-tab" onclick="switchCountryTab(event,''customs'')">æ¸…å…³æ”¿ç­– <span class="tab-count">' + customsCount + '</span></button>';
    html += '</div><div class="country-tabs-content">';
    
    if (airportCount > 0) {
        html += '<div class="tab-panel active" id="tab-airports"><div class="tab-header">' + country.name + ' Â· å·²æ˜¾ç¤º ' + airportCount + ' ä¸ªæœºåœº</div><div class="data-list">';
        if (country.airports.international) country.airports.international.forEach(function(i) { html += '<div class="data-row"><span class="data-code">' + i.code + '</span><span class="data-dot intl"></span><span class="data-name-cn">' + i.name + '</span><span class="data-name-en">' + i.enName + '</span><span class="data-meta">å›½é™…æœºåœº</span></div>'; });
        if (country.airports.domestic) country.airports.domestic.forEach(function(i) { html += '<div class="data-row"><span class="data-code">' + i.code + '</span><span class="data-dot dom"></span><span class="data-name-cn">' + i.name + '</span><span class="data-name-en">' + i.enName + '</span><span class="data-meta">å›½å†…æœºåœº</span></div>'; });
        html += '</div></div>';
    }
    if (portCount > 0) {
        html += '<div class="tab-panel" id="tab-ports"><div class="tab-header">' + country.name + ' Â· å·²æ˜¾ç¤º ' + portCount + ' ä¸ªæ¸¯å£</div><div class="data-list">';
        if (country.ports.international) country.ports.international.forEach(function(i) { html += '<div class="data-row"><span class="data-code">' + i.code + '</span><span class="data-dot intl"></span><span class="data-name-cn">' + i.name + '</span><span class="data-name-en">' + i.enName + '</span><span class="data-meta">' + i.city + ' Â· ' + i.description + '</span></div>'; });
        if (country.ports.domestic) country.ports.domestic.forEach(function(i) { html += '<div class="data-row"><span class="data-code">' + i.code + '</span><span class="data-dot dom"></span><span class="data-name-cn">' + i.name + '</span><span class="data-name-en">' + i.enName + '</span><span class="data-meta">' + i.city + ' Â· ' + i.description + '</span></div>'; });
        html += '</div></div>';
    }
    if (airlineCount > 0) {
        html += '<div class="tab-panel" id="tab-airlines"><div class="tab-header">' + country.name + ' Â· å·²æ˜¾ç¤º ' + airlineCount + ' ä¸ªèˆªå¸</div><div class="data-list">';
        country.airlines.forEach(function(i) { html += '<div class="data-row"><span class="data-code">' + i.code + '</span><span class="data-dot intl"></span><span class="data-name-cn">' + i.name + '</span><span class="data-name-en">' + i.enName + '</span><span class="data-meta">æ¢çº½ï¼š' + i.hub + '</span></div>'; });
        html += '</div></div>';
    }

function switchCountryTab(event, tabName) {
    document.querySelectorAll('.country-tab').forEach(function(btn) { btn.classList.remove('active'); });
    document.querySelectorAll('.tab-panel').forEach(function(panel) { panel.classList.remove('active'); });

```bash
function generateCountryTabs(country) {
    let html = '';
    const airportCount = (country.airports?.international?.length || 0) + (country.airports?.domestic?.length || 0);
    const portCount = (country.ports?.international?.length || 0) + (country.ports?.domestic?.length || 0);
    const airlineCount = country.airlines?.length || 0;
    const shippingCount = country.shippingLines?.length || 0;
    const provinceCount = country.provinces?.length || 0;
    const customsCount = country.customsPolicies?.length || 0;
    
    html += '<div class="country-tabs-horizontal">';
    if (airportCount > 0) html += '<button class="country-tab active" onclick="switchCountryTab(event,''airports'')">æœºåœº <span class="tab-count">' + airportCount + '</span></button>';
    if (portCount > 0) html += '<button class="country-tab" onclick="switchCountryTab(event,''ports'')">æ¸¯å£ <span class="tab-count">' + portCount + '</span></button>';
    if (airlineCount > 0) html += '<button class="country-tab" onclick="switchCountryTab(event,''airlines'')">èˆªå¸ <span class="tab-count">' + airlineCount + '</span></button>';
    if (shippingCount > 0) html += '<button class="country-tab" onclick="switchCountryTab(event,''shipping'')">èˆ¹å¸ <span class="tab-count">' + shippingCount + '</span></button>';
    if (provinceCount > 0) html += '<button class="country-tab" onclick="switchCountryTab(event,''provinces'')">çœä»½åŸå¸‚ <span class="tab-count">' + provinceCount + '</span></button>';
    if (customsCount > 0) html += '<button class="country-tab" onclick="switchCountryTab(event,''customs'')">æ¸…å…³æ”¿ç­– <span class="tab-count">' + customsCount + '</span></button>';
    html += '</div><div class="country-tabs-content">';
    
    if (airportCount > 0) {
```

```diff
+         });
```
```diff
+         html += '&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;';

+         });
+         html += '&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;';
+     }
+     
+     html += '&lt;/div&gt;';
+     return html;
+ }
+ 
+ // ===== æ ‡ç­¾é¡µåˆ‡æ¢ =====
+ function switchCountryTab(event, tabName) {
+     // ç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰active
+     document.querySelectorAll('.country-tab').forEach(btn =&gt; btn.classList.remove('active'));

+     // æ·»åŠ activeåˆ°å½“å‰
+     event.target.classList.add('active');
+     document.getElementById('tab-' + tabName).classList.add('active');
+ }
```
